bibl.title: Judgement on camels - or fiction?
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Coll. priv√©es: P. Kairis sans No. d'Inv.
Angeliki Syrkou, Judgement on camels - or fiction?
Recto: report of court proceedings concerning camels, being either documentary text or prose fiction. Mid-2nd century AD. - Verso: Private account of expenses. 2nd-3rd century AD.
